A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Finally got to see this much talked about film. I was 12 when I saw the first film so having grown up with the story I am probably as qualified as any of the 5 star rating \"professional \"critics or the 1 star rating so called \"super fans\". Much as I expected for me it was neither the classic nor was it the Disney ravaged turkey. Aside from being half an hour too long and littered with some annoying slap-stick comedy it deserved the price of the ticket. Can it survive in the future? I am not sure because for me the current characters lack the charisma of a Han Solo\, the feistiness of the young Princess Leia\, or the original evil of Darth Vader. Ho hum\, that's age for you.
